references.paper_title: Synthesizing Obama: Learning Lip Sync from Audio
references.reason: This paper is important as it is a seminal work on synthesizing realistic lip movements from audio, laying groundwork for later research.

references.paper_title: A Lip Sync Expert Is All You Need for Speech to Lip Generation in the Wild
references.reason: This paper introduced a lip-sync expert network and has been highly influential in advancing lip synchronization accuracy.

references.paper_title: SadTalker: Learning Realistic 3D Motion Coefficients for Stylized Audio-Driven Single Image Talking Face Animation
references.reason: This paper introduced SadTalker, a popular keypoint-based method, which preserves character identity in the generated talking portraits.

references.paper_title: High-Resolution Image Synthesis with Latent Diffusion Models
references.reason: This paper introduced latent diffusion models, which became fundamental and is essential for high-resolution image generation
This paper introduced VAEs, a fundamental deep learning technology for generative models, which is still a common technology.
